entity.description: Full-stack engineer building developer tools that solve real problems. Creator of git-scope and other open-source utilities focused on developer productivity and multi-repo workflows.

projects.name: git-scope
projects.description:
A fast TUI dashboard to view the git status of all your repositories in one place. Stop the cd → git status loop. git-scope solves the "Multi-Repo Blindness" problem by providing a command center view across dozens of repositories.

Features include fuzzy search, dirty filtering, workspace switching, contribution graphs, disk usage visualization, and editor integration. Designed to be read-only, local-first, and blazing fast (<10ms startup).
